docs.snippet: Nine members of the crew of the American four-masted wooden schooner Blue Peter, which caught fire and was abandoned 100 miles off the coast of Uruguay on Dec. 12, arrived here Yesterday on the Munson Line steamship Southern Cross from Montevideo.
docs.lead_paragraph: Nine members of the crew of the American four-masted wooden schooner Blue Peter, which caught fire and was abandoned 100 miles off the coast of Uruguay on Dec. 12, arrived here Yesterday on the Munson Line steamship Southern Cross from Montevideo.
docs.abstract: S S Blue Peter burned on Dec 12; crew arrives in N Y C

headline.main: BURNED SCHOONER'S CREW RETURNS HERE; Blue Peter Abandoned 100 Miles Off Uruguay Coast on Dec. 12. SEAMAN GETS PARALYSIS Vessel Towed Ashore a Total Loss --Sailors Exhausted Fighting Fire.

docs.snippet: The foreign exchange market was again strong and higher yesterday. The good tone evidenced in the early dealings was attributable, as on Monday, to the receipt here before our opening of London cables bringing higher than our previous closing rates.
docs.lead_paragraph: The foreign exchange market was again strong and higher yesterday. The good tone evidenced in the early dealings was attributable, as on Monday, to the receipt here before our opening of London cables bringing higher than our previous closing rates.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE; Sterling, Francs and Other Continentals Advance on Strong London Cables.

docs.snippet: State and municipal offerings are the feature of newly issued bonds introduced to investors today by banking houses. An issue of $4,500,000 State of North Carolina 5 per cent. funding bonds is offered at a price to yield from 4.75 per cent. to 4.65...
docs.lead_paragraph: State and municipal offerings are the feature of newly issued bonds introduced to investors today by banking houses. An issue of $4,500,000 State of North Carolina 5 per cent. funding bonds is offered at a price to yield from 4.75 per cent. to 4.65 per cent. by a syndicate composed of the Bankers Trust Company, B.J. Van Ingen Co.,

headline.main: MANY NEW BONDS OFFERED TO PUBLIC; Long-Term Issues Are Prominent Among Municipal andState Flotations.TWO RAIL BLOCKS ON SALEUruguay Reported in the Market for Loan, but Deal Is Not Expected for Some Time.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 11.--American trade with European countries was greater by $775,000,000 in 1921 than during the last pre-war year, 1913, according to an estimate based on eleven months' statistics made public tonight by the Commerce Department.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 11.--American trade with European countries was greater by $775,000,000 in 1921 than during the last pre-war year, 1913, according to an estimate based on eleven months' statistics made public tonight by the Commerce Department.

headline.main: OUR TRADE ABROAD ABOVE PRE-WAR YEAR; Business With Europe in 1921 Greater by $775,000,000 Than in 1913, Estimates Show. DOUBLE IN LATIN AMERICA Commerce With Southern Nations Greater Than Was Forecast by 1913 Curve of Increase.
